participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and nurturing, Emily balances her work and studies while dreaming of a future in medicine.
participant_1.background: I cannot wait to start my new life. Until then I will make 215 an hour. I hope to become a doctor one day. I am a college student who is a full time working mom. I make ends meet by waiting tables.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about art, Liam expresses his emotions through his paintings and aims to inspire others.
participant_2.background: My favorite class is painting. I am in art school. I like to work with acrylics. I aspire to paint murals. I have blonde hair.

content.text: What do you do for work?
Oh, cool! What's your favorite class?
Me too! I love painting. I used to paint a lot when I was younger.
That's awesome! What kind of things did you like to paint?
I used to like to paint landscapes and portraits.
I love painting landscapes too! I love the way you can capture the beauty of nature in a painting.
Yeah, me too! It's so relaxing to paint landscapes.
I agree! Do you still paint?
Not as much as I used to, but I still like to do it from time to time.
That's great! You should keep painting. It's a really good way to relax and express yourself.
Thanks! I'll try to paint more often.
Good! You should also check out my art show next week. I'm going to be showing some of my paintings.
Oh, that's great! I'll definitely be there.
Thanks! I'm excited to show you my work.
